title: Shirim
lyrics:
I'm feeling kind of ____
I've listened to your soul
I wish I enjoyed _____
If you try to read my thoughts
I hope you don't because
Promise it would hurt you more than you know



My feelings overflow

I had fun before

I decide to make

Not to ??

In this endless force

All I do is force

You to miss me

But you won't



It seems like I'm getting old

It feels like our sun is gone

It seems like you're almost gone

It feels like it's all my fault



If you try to read my thoughts

I hope you don't get close

Promise it would hurt you more than you know



It seems like I'm getting old

It feels like our sun is gone

It seems like you're almost gone

It feels like it's all my fault
